mapper.update: UPDATE address SET name = #{name}, handphone = #{handphone}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address = #{address}, address2 = #{address2} WHERE addressnum = #{addressnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address(name, handphone, address, zipcode, address2) VALUES(#{name},#{handphone},#{address},#{zipcode},#{address2})
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) from address
name like concat('%',#{word},'%')
handphone like concat('%',#{word},'%')
name like concat('%', #{word} ,'%') or handphone like concat('%', #{word} ,'%')

SELECT addressnum,name,handphone,zipcode,address FROM address
name like concat('%',#{word},'%')
handphone like concat('%',#{word},'%')
name like concat('%',#{word},'%') or handphone like concat('%',#{word},'%')
